com.safety4kids.game.Entities

Class HazardSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.safety4kids.game.Entities.Hazard
          • com.safety4kids.game.Entities.HazardSprite

  • public class HazardSprite
extends Hazard
    This Class represents the main hazard type, it defines the textures, box2d body, and updates the position and texture regions of the hazard Sprite resources are original from Erfan.Y and Bill.B

    Course Info:

    Author:
    Erfan Yeganehfar, Bill Bai Ms. Krasteva Modifications: 4.0 Finised the constructor added instance variables, and defined the hazrad in box2d 4.1 Added the texture region of the hazard 4.2 Added the different types of hazards and their texture regions
